Important to remember #ZTE is about 2 seperate issues. 
1: Sanctions violations. The penalties imposed for that are ok. 
2: Risk they pose to our national security. This is the focus of our proposal. We should do NOTHING that keeps a national security threat in business ANYWHERE.
